snippet.title: Micro Machines: Mini Challenge Mayhem | Official Pre-Order Trailer | Meta Quest Platforms
snippet.description: Relive the golden days of adolescence, racing Micro Machines around tracks and bringing impossible courses, stunts, and speed to life! Build tracks and blaze through circuits, perform stunts at max speed, crash elaborate sets for ultimate demolition, and much more! Micro Machines: Mini Challenge Mayhem will be available January 4th, 2024 ➡️ https://metaque.st/3R7W4wD
